headers.subject: [tosdr:2684] MyKolab.com is Open Source

html:
We provide the Service on software we have developed, participated in the development in, as well as software that was developed by third parties. All that software is Open Source / Free Software according to the definitions of the Open Source Initiative (OSI) and the Free Software Foundation (FSF).

Title: MyKolab.com is open source

Topic: data-export

Summary: MyKolab.com provides their services of their software in open source format. This means that there is nothing stopping you from moving your data from MyKolab and running it on your own server.

Score: 100 (good)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: MyKolab.com is Open Source
text:
>
> We provide the Service on software we have developed, participated in the 
> development in, as well as software that was developed by third parties. 
> All that software is *Open Source / Free Software* according to the 
> definitions of the Open Source Initiative (OS <http://opensource.org/>I)<http://opensource.org/> and 
> the Free Software Foundation (FSF) <http://www.fsf.org/>.


Title: MyKolab.com is open source

Topic: data-export

Summary: MyKolab.com provides their services of their software in open 
source format. This means that there is nothing stopping you from moving 
your data from MyKolab and running it on your own server.

Score: 100 (good)
